snippet: Amazon.com and the CBS Corporation on Monday announced a first-of-its-kind deal for the repeat rights to "Under the Dome," a 13-episode television series based on the Stephen King novel of the same name.
abstract: Amazon.com and the CBS Corporation on Monday announced a first-of-its-kind deal for the repeat rights to "Under the Dome," a 13-episode television series based on the Stephen King novel of the same name.
